Name: C. A. Portela Rosin
Description:
C. was shot 4 times near the spot where she worked. More than 8 years later police finally arrested a suspect.

> On Thursday, June 17, 2019, after several investigations by the investigating team of the 16th Campo Mourãos Police Subdivision, the arrest of an individual who had an unfavorable warrant of arrest for having participated in the murder of a [trans woman] that had by nickname 'He-Man', crime this occurred in 2014 in Campo Mourão. The arrested man was sent to the prison of the 16th SDP where the justice system remains. 
>
> The crime was homicide against the [trans woman] [deadname] Portela Rosin, also known as "He-man", was registered the night of Tuesday, February 11, 2014, when the 39-year-old victim was found dead with four shots, near the spot where she worked in Campo Mourão.

C.'s murder was not recorded on the official TDoR 2014 memorial list released by Transgender Europe (TGEU) in November 2014.

Name: Jessica Gaviria
Description:
Jessica died as a result of complications arising from a cosmetic filler injection. At least one of the hospitals she was taken to by a friend refused to admit her.

> Knowing the risks that she was facing last Monday, Jessica Gaviria made the decision to apply liquid silicone to increase the size of her buttocks with the help of a friend. However, Helen Garcia, a friend of the victim, reported that Jessica Gaviria died as a result. 
> 
> "Jessica was taken to several hospitals and rejected, one, for not having an EPS and for being a transgender woman," said Garcia. 
> 
> According to doctors at the Hospital Universitario del Valle, the woman arrived unconscious after being given three liters of liquid silicone. 
> 
> The surgeon Fabián Hernández explained the risks of the application of this substance: "once it reaches the lungs it produces an inflammation and a very severe edema in the tissue which affects the oxygenation of the tissues". 
> 
> The authorities continue calling for people who want to have this type of procedure to have it done only in authorised facilities.

Jessica's death was not recorded on the official TDoR 2014 list released by Transgender Europe (TGEU).

http://noti5.tv/muere-transexual-por-aplicacion-de-silicona-en-el-cuerpo/

https://www.facebook.com/OlimpicaStereoMonteria/photos/a.616743411683253/742956665728593/?type=3&theater

Name: A.S.S.
Description:
The victim was shot dead at around 9pm on Friday 28th February.

> An unidentified [trans woman] was shot dead on Friday night, around 9 pm, at Frei Serapião Street, in Bairro Brasil, near Av. Integração. The body was found after people went out after hearing gunfire.
>
> The victim was shot dead in the head. During the crime scene investigation , a crack pipe, a lighter and a cigarette, apparently of pot, were found. The body was sent to the Legal Medical Institute, where it is awaiting recognition.
